long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MangaMark automatically bookmarks the manga you read on compatible sites so you can pick up right where you left off.
(You can find the list of compatible sites in the images provided or by installing the extension and clicking "Compatible Sites". There are currently 9 compatible manga sites, but more are on the way!)
